doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 县营业部通信能力月报表

sql.name: countycorrespondpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: countycorrespond.group
countycorrespond.left
sql.item: select trim('县营业部基站数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('县营业部载频数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('县营业部话音信道数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual

sql.name: countycorrespond.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('县营业部基站数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,sum(t.c802000019) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('县营业部载频数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,sum(t.c802000020) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('县营业部话音信道数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,sum(t.c802000021) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
